text: Vincenzo Fasano (2 September 1951 â€“ 23 January 2022) was an Italian politician. He was a member of National Alliance and Forza Italia. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 2001 to 2006 and again from 2018 to 2022. Fasano died of cancer in Salerno, Italy on 23 January 2022, at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Campania
title: Enzo Fasano
